data.message: Hi there, My facebook recenlty have been hacked twice. Please help me to fix this issue due to yesterday Im just change my password. And now I cant reset my facebook with my password(sistem keep showing invalid password)or mobile phone number, Im Malaysian but have track that my account try to login in Iraq. And I cant get my one time password or code through email because the email address have been close for few years ago and I just can get my code by mobile phone. I hope that your guys can help me fix it as soon as possible.

replies.message: Hi Mavis. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2oFyCZL. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2nGPgHi. -Jessica
